patientRole.addr: None of the following address elements are specifically required by HITSP C32, so the address could be be just plain text at this location? Use of one or more of the following labeled address lines, with meaningful content, is recommended. First Address Line Next Address line - if needed, etc. CityName StateName ZipCode(5or9) USA

name.given: Middle Name or Initial - if known

code.displayName: propensity to adverse reactions to drug

tr.td: 2 puffs QID PRN (as needed for wheezing)

procedure.text: Extract blood for CBC test. Note that IHE rules require description and reference to go here rather than in originalText of code.
